title: The Informer
creator_credit: John Ford, Cliff Reid and RKO Radio Pictures
brief_description: John Ford’s motion picture masterpiece is about a dull witted lout who sells out his best friend, an IRA leader, for a twenty pound note, and then is overwhelmed by the consequence of his act. Based on the novel by Liam O’Flaherty. Stars Victor McLaglen.
